entries.meaning: (archaic) A dowdy person, especially a woman; a frump.
examples: He, of course, was only an unbalanced religious fanatic, whose opinions were not of the slightest consequence to anybody, whom everybody seemed to take a dislike to at sight (except ignorant paupers like the Cooneys), and whose ideal type of girl would probably be some hideous dowd, a slum-worker, a Salvation Army lassie, perhaps.

entries.meaning: Any of various European moths of the genus Blastobasis.
